text: The 1998 Qatar Crown Prince Cup was the 4th edition of this cup tournament in men's football (soccer). It was played by the top 4 teams of the Q-League. Al- Sadd were crowned champions for the first time. ==Results== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; margin: 0 auto;" |- !1998 Qatar Crown Prince Cup Winners |- | Al-Sadd 1st Title |} Category:Qatar Crown Prince Cup Cup
title: 1998 Qatar Crown Prince Cup
